We are at #Bauma2025 ‚Äì are you joining us?

The future of the construction and machinery world begins here: experience our latest innovations and technologies at Bauma 2025. 

Under the motto ‚ÄòHands on the future‚Äô, we demonstrate how #Liebherr is actively taking the future into its own hands and meeting the challenges of tomorrow today ‚Äì together with you.

#handsonliebherr #liebherrgroup

#handsonliebherr #collection #Liebherr

The Moselle, with a length of 544 km the second longest tributary of the Rhine, plays a decisive role as an international waterway. 28 barrages enable inland waterway vessels to make smooth progress. 

However, the failure of a lock, as in December 2024, represents a significant disruption to inland traffic. In order to act quickly and efficiently in this critical situation, the Mosel-Saar-Lahn Waterways and Shipping Authority (WSA) has had a framework agreement with the Trier-based crane rental expert Steil Kranarbeiten GmbH & Co. KG for years. 

Thanks to this cooperation and state-of-the-art #Liebherr technology, the damaged gate could be salvaged and a new one installed. In the meantime, our mobile crane played the main role in the emergency lock-out of 74 ships stuck on the Moselle.

üëâ Read more here: https://lnkd.in/ekDVtsYkThe Moselle, with a length of 544 km the second longest tributary of the Rhine, plays a decisive role as an international waterway. 28 barrages enable inland waterway vessels to make smooth progress.

KG for years. 

Thanks to this cooperation and state-of-the-art #Liebherr technology, the damaged gate could be salvaged and a new one installed. In the meantime, our mobile crane played the main role in the emergency lock-out of 74 ships stuck on the Moselle.

An unbeatable team: LRH 200 unplugged ü§ù DHR 110 #DownTheHoleDrilling 

1Ô∏è‚É£ Precision & Straightness: DTH drilling provides excellent hole straightness and accuracy, which is crucial for foundation work and blasting applications.
2Ô∏è‚É£ Efficiency in Hard Rock: The method is highly effective in hard rock formations, where other drilling techniques may struggle.
3Ô∏è‚É£ Minimal Energy Loss: The hammer is located at the bottom, reducing energy loss compared to top hammer drilling.
4Ô∏è‚É£ Versatile Applications: Suitable for foundation piling, well drilling, mining, and quarrying.

üí°Wrapping up two insightful days at the Bauma #MediaDialogue! 

With around 60 media discussions, the event provided a great opportunity to share insights on our ‚ÄòHands on the future‚Äô motto and present the latest content from the Bauma Pre-Press Kit. 

üîéThe discussions covered a wide range of industry-relevant topics, reflecting strong interest in alternative drive technologies, automation, and digitalisation‚Äîparticularly regarding market readiness, infrastructure challenges, and potential applications.

The high level of engagement underscores the importance of these topics as we move toward Bauma 2025. 

üôèA huge thank you to all the journalists and industry experts who engaged in these meaningful conversations! 

üëâ Pre-Press Kit information: https://lnkd.in/eQAxRsDG

From optician to apprenticeship as a mechatronics technician at Liebherr Maritime Cranes in Rostock, Germany.  Not an ordinary career, but Leon went his own way and we are glad that this path has led him to us. 

Read our portrait article to find out more about the 25-year-old from Dresden, Germany and why he thinks that his apprenticeship is a "jackpot".

üí• An exciting world first in New South Wales, Australia! üåè

In November last year, our colleagues at Liebherr-Australia repowered not just one but TWO R 9800s, replacing their existing engines with our very own D9812 engines for Yancoal Australia Ltd at Mount Thorley Warkworth operation in the Hunter Valley. üõ†Ô∏è

These were the very first R 9800s to be repowered to run on our D98 series engines, which are designed specifically for the rigours of the mining industry. ü§©

Focus on wheel loaders: legendary paint styles to enhance any construction site! üé®

Anyone who thinks that #Liebherr wheel loaders are only available in classic yellow, is not aware that we offer customised solutions. 

Responding to customer requests or special occasions, we have already realised a wide range of special paint styles and wraps. 

The spectrum ranges from elegant, classic colours to colourful combinations, national flags and postcard motifs. 

Many of these creations are that spectacular they resemble true works of art on wheels. Here is a small selection of legendary paint style.

Find out more here üëá

Our Global Trainee Programme is more than just a career start ‚Äì it‚Äôs a transformative journey! 
With hands-on experience, mentorship, and personal growth, we‚Äôre setting our trainees up for success in a rapidly changing world.
A highlight: the Networking Days! This year, 25 new trainees from around the globe gathered in Biberach, connecting, learning, and discovering exciting opportunities. ü§ùüíº 
They also enjoyed an exclusive behind-the-scenes tour of our Tower Crane production. 
We‚Äôre excited to see the fresh ideas and perspectives our new trainees will bring!

We see ourselves as a high-tech company that actively contributes to technological advancement and aims to fully leverage the opportunities presented by digital technologies. Thereby we take a comprehensive approach to digitalisation, implementing it across our product segments and throughout the entire customer journey. 

The digital transformation is coordinated by the Liebherr-Digital Development Center GmbH, an internal competence center that develops and implements digital solutions across product segments and divisions.

In December 2024, Liebherr-Australia proudly delivered our 700th bucket‚Äîa 37.5m¬≥ R9600 backhoe bucket for a valued customer.

Since 1995, we‚Äôve supported Australia‚Äôs mining industry with high-quality buckets built for tough conditions. In just the last five years, we‚Äôve delivered 196 buckets, including a record-breaking 49 in 2024!

This milestone is thanks to our 60+ skilled employees, whose craftsmanship ensures Liebherr buckets are trusted for quality and performance.

Thank you to our customers, partners, and employees for making this possible. Here‚Äôs to an even bigger 2025!

‚ÑπÔ∏è Vertical Line Finder ‚Äì lifting without diagonal pull!

Our Vertical Line Finder supports the crane operator with the lifting of loads by preventing diagonal pull, and therefore sway, when lifting. 

The crane automatically controls the slewing gear and trolley to ensure that the load hook is always optimally positioned above the load‚Äôs centre of gravity. üèóÔ∏è

As a result, the load is always lifted vertically, without any sway, which increases safety for people and sensitive components on site. 

This assistance system is now available for our new K-series and L-series.

More information: https://lnkd.in/eSkSV5gu

#liebherr #towercranes #construction #assistancesystems #liebherrgroup
